participant_1.background:
I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.
i like to build things.
my favorite band is the avert brother.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.

participant_2.background:
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I currently rent my home.
i volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
i like the band queens of the stone age.

content.text: Whats up?
My knee surgery is coming up soon, I'm a little nervous
Oh no! Well you'll be in good hands, doctors are awesome!
I hope so! I'm hoping for a quick recovery, I like to be active.
Yeah, getting back to your normal routine is important.
I'm thinking I'll volunteer at the Red Cross on the weekends to stay busy.
That's a great idea! I'm sure they'd love the help.
Yeah, I like helping people. And I like the band Queens of the Stone Age.
Oh cool, me too! I've been listening to them a lot lately.
Really? What's your favorite song?
I like "Go with the Flow" a lot.
That's a good one, I like "The Lost Art of Keeping a Secret"
Oh yeah, that's a great one too.
I like to build things, you?
I do too! I love to fix things around the house.
Cool, me too. I'm always trying to find new projects.
Me too, I just finished building a new desk for my office.
Oh nice, what kind of desk?
It's a simple wooden desk, but it's perfect for my needs.
Sounds great! I'm always looking for new ideas for projects
